TopicTitle: KSP C100 Custom Controller Build! (Link to Detailed Build and Parts List Included)

Articles.Content:
(First off this is my first post here so I hope I'm dropping this in the right category!)

This controller was 100% designed and built by me from scratch over the past week! I recently picked up KSP over quatrantine (I'm late to the party, I know haha!) and I was instantly hooked. Before I knew it I was craving input beyond simple KB and mouse!

Here is a link to a very detailed rundown of the process i took to take this from an idea to the finished product! It's not quite a tutorial, but if anyone has any questions on how I completed any steps I'd be glad to answer them!

Link to the build and some demo vids







Only thing to do now is stop procrastinating on building that space station around Kerbin!
